relics.name: Brass Goblet
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 2 thevacant:Void.
relics.flavorText: An ancient artifact with dark power.

relics.name: Locket Piece
relics.description: After a card thevacant:Rebounds, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: A reminder of a life lost. Or at least, a piece of one.

relics.name: Deathbell
relics.description: At the start of each combat, if you are thevacant:Wounded, gain 10 Temporary_HP.
relics.flavorText: The scent invokes a feeling of dread.

relics.name: Cracked Crystal Ball
relics.description: Exhausted cards return to your draw pile after 2 turns. When a card would enter your discard pile, it Exhausts instead.
relics.flavorText: Sometimes magic leaking into the world is more powerful than when it is contained.

relics.name: Bound Soul
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if you are thevacant:Wounded, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: As death closes in, the artifact's hold on you weakens, and you feel your power grow.

relics.name: Overflowing Goblet
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 2 Artifact.
relics.flavorText: An ancient artifact, now overflowing with dark power.

relics.name: Tombstone
relics.description: At the start of combat, after you draw, thevacant:Mill your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Just as we all go to the grave eventually, all cards go to the discard pile eventually.

relics.name: Polishing Rag
relics.description: All thevacant:Gems other than Diamonds do not decrease in size.
relics.flavorText: Shiny gems are more powerful, everyone knows this.

keywords.name: Amethyst
keywords.description:
Gem: Mill and gain Gloom.
Loses size over time.

keywords.name: Break
keywords.description: Evoke a Gem Orb.

keywords.name: Diamond
keywords.description:
Gem: Gain Intangible and Buffer.
Loses size over time.

keywords.name: Doom
keywords.description: Creatures take more damage for each Doom they have.

keywords.name: [#6A97E2]Echo[]
keywords.description: Gain Vigor, Temperance, or Artifact based on the card type it is on.

keywords.name: [#6A97E2]Echo[]
keywords.description: Gain Vigor equal to your Void.

keywords.name: [#6A97E2]Echo[]
keywords.description: Gain 1 Artifact.

keywords.name: [#6A97E2]Echo[]
keywords.description: Gain Temperance equal to your Void.

keywords.name: Emerald
keywords.description:
Gem: Draw cards.
Loses size over time.

keywords.name: Enhance
keywords.description: Grant an effect to a card for the rest of combat.

keywords.name: Etch
keywords.description: Gain a Rune which can be Released to trigger special effects.

keywords.name: Everyone
keywords.description: ALL enemies and you.

keywords.name: Exhume
keywords.description: Move a number of cards from your Exhaust pile to your hand.

keywords.name: Ferocity
keywords.description:
Each turn, increase the damage of the next attack you play.
Release: Gain temporary Strength.

keywords.name: Form
keywords.description: The trait your Soul takes on. Grants different active and passive abilities.

keywords.name: Fracture
keywords.description: Fracture effects happen when you have X or more Will.

keywords.name: [#ee4200]Furious[]
keywords.description: You are Furious if you are in Fury Form.

keywords.name: [#ee4200]Fury[] [#ee4200]Form[]
keywords.description:
Syphon: Gain Vigor.
--------
At the start of your turn, Syphon.

keywords.name: Gem
keywords.description: Gems are Orbs that reduce in size when their passive effect triggers.

keywords.name: Goblet
keywords.description: The Brass Goblet or Overflowing Goblet relic.

keywords.name: Healthy
keywords.description: Healthy effects trigger if you are above 50% of your max health.

keywords.name: Heavy
keywords.description: When your deck is reshuffled, move to the bottom of the draw pile.

keywords.name: Hollow
keywords.description: Release: If you are Healthy, gain Dexterity. If you are Wounded, gain Strength.

keywords.name: Immaterialize
keywords.description: When you Exhaust a card, Enhance it with this much Materialize, then reduce the Immaterialize amount by 1.

keywords.name: Light
keywords.description: When your deck is reshuffled, move to the top of the draw pile.

keywords.name: [#C687EE]Materialize[]
keywords.description: If this card is Exhausted, it loses 1 Materialize at the end of your turn. Once all Materialize is lost, this card is moved to the top of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Mill
keywords.description: Move an amount of cards from the top of your draw pile to your discard pile.

keywords.name: Mine
keywords.description: Create an orb slot and fill it with an orb.

keywords.name: Necra
keywords.description:
Heal HP at the end of combat.
Release: Take damage.

keywords.name: Onyx
keywords.description:
Gem: Apply Doom.
Loses size over time.

keywords.name: Opal
keywords.description:
Gem: Gains Energy.
Loses size over time.

keywords.name: Prime
keywords.description: Do the following effect the first time this card is played each combat.

keywords.name: Reap
keywords.description: Heal this much HP when you attack this target.

keywords.name: Rebound
keywords.description: If this card would be Milled, add it to your hand instead of the discard pile.

keywords.name: Release
keywords.description: Release all Runes you have Etched.

keywords.name: Return
keywords.description: Move a number of cards from your discard pile to your hand.

keywords.name: Ruby
keywords.description:
Gem: Gain Vigor and Strength.
Loses size over time.

keywords.name: Rune
keywords.description: Runes can have Passive effects and effects when they are Released.

keywords.name: Sapphire
keywords.description:
Orb: Gain Temperance and Dexterity.
Loses size over time.

keywords.name: Shroud
keywords.description: Halve incoming damage. Reduced by 1 at the start of your turn, and when you play an attack.

keywords.name: [#66eeee]Solemn[] [#66eeee]Form[]
keywords.description:
Syphon: Gain Temperance.
--------
When you enter this Form, Syphon.

keywords.name: [#82eeee]Soul[]
keywords.description: At the end of combat, heal half this much HP.

keywords.name: [#82eeee]Soulforged[]
keywords.description: AFTER this card is played, draw this many cards and gain this much energy.

keywords.name: Syphon
keywords.description: Trigger the Syphon ability of your current Form.

keywords.name: Temperance
keywords.description: The next time you Block, gain additional Block.

keywords.name: Unnate
keywords.description: Starts at the bottom of your draw pile.

keywords.name: [#ee82ee]Vacant[] [#ee82ee]Form[]
keywords.description:
Syphon: Lose HP.
--------
You cannot die or enter Fury Form.
As you leave this Form, Syphon.

keywords.name: [#ee82ee]Void[]
keywords.description: When your draw pile is empty, deal more damage and gain more Block.

keywords.name: [#ee82ee]Voidbound[]
keywords.description: Repeat this card's effects an additional number of times equal to its Voidbound.

keywords.name: [#ee82ee]Void[] [#ee82ee]Form[]
keywords.description:
Syphon: Gain Void.
--------
When you enter this Form, Syphon.
Gain additional Block and deal additional damage for each Void you have.

keywords.name: Ward
keywords.description: Whenever you lose HP, gain Block next turn. Release: Gain Block twice.

keywords.name: Will
keywords.description: Your ability to fight the influence of the artifact.

keywords.name: Wounded
keywords.description: Wounded effects trigger if you are at or below 50% of your max health.
